abstract: An uproar last week about fake Class of 2013 groups on Facebook raises old questions about authenticity on the Internet.
snippet: An uproar last week about fake Class of 2013 groups on Facebook raises old questions about authenticity on the Internet.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE 12:20PM — The post has been updated to include a response from Facebook .

headline.main: Separating Real From Fake on the Internet
